psiTurk Documentation
=====================

.. toctree:: :maxdepth: 2

--------------

WARNING!!!!!! **psiTurk** is currently undergoing a major update that
will break compatibility with past versions. Documentation is now being
updated to refer to the project version in the /dev branch. Sorry for
confusion, but things will settle down shortly.

--------------

Welcome to **psiTurk**'s documentation. To start, you'll first need to
install **psiTurk**. Instructions can be found on the `Getting psiTurk installed on your computer <Getting-psiTurk-installed-on-your-computer.html>`__ page. Afterwards, head over to `Quickstart <Quickstart.html>`__ , or for a more detailed tutorial demonstrating how to
setup a simple experiment with **psiTurk**, visit `Getting up and
running with the basic Stroop task <Step-by-step-tutorials#getting-up-and-running-with-the-basic-stroop-task>`__.

User's Guide
============

-  `Forword <Forward.html>`__
    -  `The psiTurk design philosophy: An analogy <Forword.html#understanding-the-psiturk-design-philosophy-an-analogy>`__

API Reference
=============

-  `psiTurk API <psiTurk-API.html>`__
    -  `Creating the psiTurk object <psiTurk-API.html#creating-the-psiturk-object>`__
    -  `psiturk.taskdata <psiTurk-API.html#psiturktaskdata>`__
    -  `psiturk.preloadPages <psiTurk-API.html#psiturkpreloadpagespagelist>`__
    -  `psiturk.getPage <psiTurk-API.html#psiturkgetpagepagename>`__
    -  `psiturk.showPage <psiTurk-API.html#psiturkshowpagepagename>`__
    -  `psiturk.preloadImages <psiTurk-API.html#psiturkpreloadimagesimagelist>`__
    -  `psiturk.recordTrialData <psiTurk-API.html#psiturkrecordtrialdataarray>`__
    -  `psiturk.recordUnstructuredData <psiTurk-API.html#psiturkrecordunstructureddatafield-value>`__
    -  `psiturk.saveData <psiTurk-API.html#psiturksavedatacallbacks>`__
    -  `psiturk.finishInstructions <psiTurk-API.html#psiturkfinishinstructions>`__
    -  `psiturk.teardownTask <psiTurk-API.html#psiturkteardowntask>`__
